Author: Hash()
Title: [ANN][PREICO] EventChain SmartTickets - Stopping Excessive Ticket Fees
Body: Happy to announce that we will be releasing our alpha prototype demonstration app before the ICO starts. The demo will showcase fast and seamless ticketing functions via contracts stored on the Ethereum blockchain, where demo EVC tokens will have clear utility and value for creating events, and purchasing tickets. The token will become more functional and valuable as more features are developed and the fully scalable application is built with funds raised.  We are sure this will persuade anyone inquiring into the technical competency of the team, that EventChain is well capable of competing with and overtaking the incumbent industry and new competition in the future! Feel free to ask questions.

Body: Yes, the alpha is VERY exciting! Working demo will truly show what EventChain is bringing to the industry, and developers will rejoice.  Speaking of Developers, the infamous Piotr Piasecki, Core Developer of Factom has now joined the EventChain Board of Advisors. We welcome Piotr's input in all aspects!   Piotr "ThePiahcu" Piasecki is one of Factom’s Core Developers and has been involved with the cryptocurrency community since 2011. Piotr wrote his master thesis on Bitcoin security in Technical University of Lodz, in Poland. He is a former moderator and top contributor to Bitcoin.StackExchange.com as well as a current moderator of /r/Bitcoin subreddit, and lives off cryptocurrencies. Piotr runs a number of Bitcoin-focused websites, including Vanity Pool and TestNet Faucet, and has been a blogger for major cryptocurrency media outlets like Brave New Coin, Crypto Biz Magazine and CoinDesk.

Author: KrakAJAX
Title: [ANN][PREICO] EventChain SmartTickets - Stopping Excessive Ticket Fees
Body: Important Links: Website | Whitepaper   Facebook | Twitter | Reddit | YouTube | Telegram | Slack | LinkedIn | Email | Bounty Thread    Try the EventChain Alpha. Alpha.EventChain.io    What is EventChain?  The EventChain Smart Ticketing platform was launched to create a peer-to-peer infrastructure where event tickets have no excessive processing fees and are widely available on a platform for everyone. There are so many problems with the current event-ticketing industry that can be fixed by EventChain’s SmartTicket platform. A lot of event goers are fed-up with monopolistic control with common problems including unfair ticketing fees, website crashes and single points of failure, ticketing scalping and ticket resale mark-up, and unfair cuts for artists who do most of the work with little return.   With EventChain you can create online or local events from any device, and make Smart Tickets available to event participants globally. The EventChain blockchain token network for event management presents the opportunity to upgrade the current event ticketing industry to faster transactions, indisputable ticket vouchers and transparency from event hosts and fully flexible and programmable Smart Tickets through the use of smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.    Smart Ticket Use Cases:  Smart Tickets are all fully programmable, enabling smart contract code that can fix tickets at a permanent price, designate a maximum mark-up value, or attribute any other individual or group pricing variables.  To prevent massive ticket purchases from scalpers, event ticket distribution options can be tailored with any custom range on the amount of tickets available to single users or groups, and optional constraints that allow for alternative distribution methods.  EventChain will have an integrated ticket resale reputation system on a distributed secondary market, allowing event ticket vendors, promoters and fans to build and grow their reputation as they sell Smart Tickets. Scalpers will clearly be identified by their Smart Ticket reputation.  EventChain will utilize various payment gateways that accept EventCoins to purchase products and services from over 205,000 vendors across 182 different countries. Payment gateways convert the EventCoins in real time to the vendor’s currency.   Leadership Team:     Board of Advisors       Dr. Steven Funk Silicon Valley Billionaire  Dr. Funk has 30 years of experience in international corporate debt, equity investment, and real estate ownership and development. Funk built the largest fund management business in Investor Category Immigrant Funds to Canada, acquired Imperial Parking and built its operations into one of the top three dominant car park management companies in North America. With Masters and Doctorate degrees, a private pilot’s license, and a ticket on the upcoming Virgin Galactic space flight, he has a plethora of business expertise.  Dr. Funk is a founding director of Unitus, and founding funder of Unitus Capital, now the largest boutique investment banking group in the microenterprise space which recently surpassed $1 billion in funding initiatives. Dr. Funk is one of the pivotal sponsors of TED talk’s annual international event.  Today, Funk manages his private investment group, Funk Partners through Funk Holdings. He engages in private financial management as well as philanthropic endeavors, with an emphasis on microfinance initiatives. His focus has been on international private equity and real estate investment, with a weighting in real estate acquisition, ownership, and development. He is also a passionate and proud member of the XPrize Foundation Innovation Board (www.xprize.org), led by Peter Diamandis.      Tokensale:   The EventChain Tokensale is September 13, 2017. The details already have been finalized.   Please read our Tokensale medium blog to see exactly how EventCoins are distributed and how the funds will be allocated.      Blog Posts and Articles:   Ed Sheeran and the Ticket Industry Fail EventChain — Fixing the Issues of the Event Ticketing Industry EventChain will Solve Today’s Ticketing Problems Will Ethereum pass Bitcoin’s Market cap by Aug 5th? Why Ethereum will be bigger than Bitcoin    In the Media BuzzFeed: Interesting Facts on EventChain Huffington Post: How Blockchain Is Shaping Our Future Reuters Insider Financial: Ethereum Passes Bitcoins Volume & EventChain SmartTickets will Change Future Event Ticket Booking Steemit: EventChain: Blockchain will Solve Today’s Ticketing Problems InvestmentPitch Media: EventChain SmartTickets is the Future of Event Ticket Booking. Fintech News network: Ethereum, BAT and Bancor ICO, EventChain SmartTickets Crypto Coin Show: EventChain Tokensale - blockchain SmartTickets for the event industry    TRANSLATED/MANAGED CROWDSALE [ANN] THREADS:   Mandarin: Mandarin Thread Russian: Russian Thread Spanish: Spanish Thread Filipino:Filipino Thread German: German Thread Hindi: Hindi Thread Indonesian: Indonesian Thread Vietnamese: Vietnamese Thread Portuguese: Portuguese Thread Turkish: Turkish: Turkish Thread French: French Thread Italian: Italian Thread Korean: Korean Thread Japanese: Japanese Thread Cantonese:Cantonese Thread Arabic: Arabic Thread Hebrew: Hebrew Thread Romanian: Romanian Thread Polish: Polish Thread  TRANSLATED EVENTCHAIN WHITEPAPERS: Mandarin: Mandarin Whitepaper Spanish: Espanol Whitepaper Indonesian: Indonesian Whitepaper Filipino: Filipino Whitepaper Vietnamese: Vietnamese Whitepaper Russian: Russian Whitepaper Japanese: Japanese Whitepaper Portuguese: Portuguese Whitepaper Korean: Korean Whitepaper Cantonese:Cantonese Whitepaper German: German Whitepaper Italian: Italian Whitepaper Polish: Polish Whitepaper Turkish: Turkish Whitepaper Arabic: Arabic Whitepaper Romanian: Romanian Whitepaper  TRANSLATED EVENTCHAIN WEBSITE: Mandarin: MandarinWebsite Russian: Russian Website Spanish: Spanish Website German: German Website Haitian: Haitian Website Polish: Polish Website Vietnamese: Vietnamese Website Korean: Korean Website Japanese: Japanese Website Cantonese:Cantonese Website Filipino: Filipino Website Hebrew: Hebrew Website Hindi: Hindi Website Indonesian: Indonesian Website Italian: Italian Website Romanian: Romanian Website Arabic: Arabic Website     Translation Bounty? Sign up form.  Still have questions? team@eventchain.io

Author: KrakAJAX
Title: [ANN][PREICO] EventChain SmartTickets - Stopping Excessive Ticket Fees
Body: Hey everyone. A lot has happened this month in the cryptocurrency space including hacks and we have been inactive on BCT since then because we realized we need to step up to the plate and deliver something safely and securely. We've redesigned www.eventchain.io, expanded the foundation of our Board of Advisors and have rolled out the social bounty campaign. I will link to the bounty thread in our next post.  We also listened to the community had to say regarding The ICO distribution and decided the ICO  participants desired more of a say in eventchain so 65% of the total eventchain tokens are being offered to participants, up from the original 40%. We have also displayed our commitment to the eventchain project by locking all of the EventChain team's and advisor's EventCoin's for a 2 year vesting period with a 25% cliff each 6 months. Our team and Board of advisors is still expanding and will grow ongoing as more smart minds come together with the same idea, to bring real tickets to real fans. All of these updates are now available in the top ANN thread which has been updated and also on eventchain.io  Please join our slack to chat and join the community. It is a mandatory step to participate in the social bounty campaign as well. Here is an invite, looking forward to it.  Ashton.

Author: dishku
Title: [ANN][PREICO] EventChain SmartTickets - Stopping Excessive Ticket Fees
Body: Avetus has very similar concept about ticket of different event but nice to see another project will also start work on same thing I think this will create competition in this market and will try to provide more better solution. Let's see who will become first to make useful this service in real life events.

Author: KrakAJAX
Title: [ANN][PREICO] EventChain SmartTickets - Stopping Excessive Ticket Fees
Body: Yes Aventus is the closest blockchain competitor. We are doing things slightly different with different long term visions and starting in different continents. Us Americas, them Europe.  If you are going to translate, please review the EventChain social bounty thread here and signup to the appropriate form: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2054237.0  Sincerely, Ashton.
